languages.text: "Все просто, ксеносы. Хотите жить — говорите правду".

traits.locale_text: "Все просто, ксеносы. Хотите жить — говорите правду".

languages.text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."
languages.original_text: "Все просто, ксеносы. Хотите жить — говорите правду".

traits.locale_text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but truth if you want to live."
"It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but truth if you want to live."
"It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."
"It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."
"It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."
"It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."

languages.text: «Es muy sencillo, xenos. Cuenta solo la verdad si queréis sobrevivir».
languages.original_text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."

traits.locale_text: «Es muy sencillo, xenos. Cuenta solo la verdad si queréis sobrevivir».

languages.text: “事情很简单，异形。如果你不想死，就实话实说。”
languages.original_text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."

traits.locale_text: “事情很简单，异形。如果你不想死，就实话实说。”

languages.text: « C'est très simple, xénos. Si vous voulez vivre, dites la vérité et seulement la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."

traits.locale_text: « C'est très simple, xénos. Si vous voulez vivre, dites la vérité et seulement la vérité. »

languages.text: 「簡単なことだ、ゼノ。生きていたければ、真実だけを話すことだ」
languages.original_text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単なことだ、ゼノ。生きていたければ、真実だけを話すことだ」

languages.text: "Es ist simpel, Xenos. Sagt nichts als die Wahrheit, wenn Ihr leben wollt."
languages.original_text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist simpel, Xenos. Sagt nichts als die Wahrheit, wenn Ihr leben wollt."

languages.text: "Gayet basit zeno. Yaşamak istiyorsan hakikatten başka bir şey söylemeyeceksin."
languages.original_text: "It is simple, xenos. Tell nothing but the truth if you want to live."

traits.locale_text: "Gayet basit zeno. Yaşamak istiyorsan hakikatten başka bir şey söylemeyeceksin."
